data.feedback: Epic correctly identifies the need to add platform configuration to an existing Flutter Dart project. File paths verified: pubspec.yaml exists, platform directories don't exist. Stories provide detailed technical guidance. Package naming inconsistency is a fixable issue.
issues: MEDIUM: Package naming inconsistency between Story 1 (com.apppasos.frontend) and Story 2 (com.example.app_pasos_frontend) - should align
LOW: project.pbxproj in epic filesToCreate but not in any story - should clarify flutter create generates this
suggestions: Standardize package name to 'com.apppasos.app_pasos_frontend' across all stories
Add clarification that `flutter create . --platforms=ios,android --org com.apppasos` should run first
Change filesToCreate to filesToModify for platform files since flutter create generates them
